author: Video Advice
description:
A discovery that could change everything—yet most people have never even heard of it.
The research you’re about to see has been presented in a safe, neutral way… but if you watch carefully, you’ll understand why breakthroughs like this rarely make it to the headlines.

Special credit to Dr. Michael Levin for his groundbreaking work on bioelectricity and regeneration.
If you want to dive deeper into his research, I highly recommend watching his own presentation here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OD5TOsPZIQY

This video contains excerpts and references for educational purposes only.
Full presentation and materials can be found here:

Michael Levin: The electrical blueprints that orchestrate life | TED - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XheAMrS8Q1c
Michael Levin: Biology, Life, Aliens, Evolution, Embryogenesis & Xenobots | Lex Fridman Podcast 325 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p3lsYlod5OU
"Against Mind-Blindness: recognizing and communicating with diverse intelligences" by Michael L
title: He Showed Too Much… A Discovery Too Dangerous to Expose
